mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.ore: Precious Ore that can be used in many ways
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.newbie_gear_bag: Creates a pack of level one gear.
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag1: Three Furnaces below, five iron wills above,
mmorpg.lore.newbie_gear_bag2: seed in the middle, materialize hope!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.lore.add_secondary_stat: More power is always good, right?
mmorpg.lore.chaos_orb: Do not gamble what you are not willing to lose.
mmorpg.lore.item_levelup: Who said your sword can't level with you?
mmorpg.lore.number_reroll: Hopefully works better than the last time.
mmorpg.lore.randomize_prefix: There is always a better choice
mmorpg.lore.randomize_suffix: There is always a better choice
mmorpg.lore.stone_of_hope: When there is hope, there is a way.
mmorpg.lore.attack_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
mmorpg.lore.defense_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
mmorpg.lore.resource_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
mmorpg.lore.normal_upgrade_infusion: Luck is Etheral and yet affects everything.
mmorpg.lore.superior_upgrade_infusion: You start to feel the essence of Luck.
mmorpg.lore.wondrous_upgrade_infusion: Grasp Luck with your own hands.
mmorpg.tooltip.number_reroll: Re-rolls all numbers on a gear
mmorpg.tooltip.stone_of_hope: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity

mmorpg.tooltip.homing: Your Single Target Spell Projectiles now Home in on the target.
mmorpg.tooltip.shining_light: Your Self Heal Spells now grant you Aoe Regen.
mmorpg.tooltip.zephyr_speed: Your Self Heal Spells now boost your speed temporarily.
mmorpg.tooltip.ghost_projectile: Your Single Target Spell Projectiles now go through enemies.
mmorpg.tooltip.purity: Your Self Heal Spells now cure you of a negative effect.
mmorpg.tooltip.buff_energy_regen: Killing Blows with Bomb Spells grant you Energy Regen.

mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.braceletnature0: Fools fight for treasure, but I keep on living.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.pantswater0: Try to move me, I dare you.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.uniquestaffthunde: Controlled power can bring both energy and destruction.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.necklacesetdrop0: I seek what is buried underneath.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.braceletwater0: Burn them all! With Ice of course.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.helmetthunder0: I see sparks all around me.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.hammerthunder0: I will be safe when my enemies are dead.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.ringenergy0: I will pay any price to continue!
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.uniquestafflifest: All blood will be mine, eventually.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.uniquestaffwater0: What is frozen is as good as dead.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.chestthunder0: Those who dared to follow had long since died.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.hammerphysical0: Not even mountains can bar my path!
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.braceletfire0: Harness Fire, wield it as your weapon. Incinerate them.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.necklacewater0: Crystal clear and yet so incredibly tough.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.helmetfire0: I see flames all around me.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.chestfire0: What can't kill me only makes me glow brighter.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.charmnature0: My life may be limited, but I shine throughout it.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.chestwater0: I am a Fortress of pure Ice.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.charmthunder0: Jade is only worth after it is polished.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.swordwater0: Energy is everywhere, it just begs to be grasped
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.helmetwater0: What mortals can't see belongs to me.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.braceletthunderna: Heavenly Lightning? I call it mana.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.necklacefire0: I will take down my enemies with me, in flames.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.necklaceenergy0: One becomes two, two becomes four!
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.necklacenature0: I seek strength only in nature.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.axewaterfire0: My efforts to merge elements shall not be in vain.
mmorpg.uniques.tooltip.chestmana0: The process of multiplying energy has just begun!
